data.client_settings: Release Channel: stable, Build Number: 16234, Version Hash: 7baf7542f6a7e89f350dd0ae187accdb88fc7a35
data.actual_result: The box is clickable to give the role to the user but no text appears
data.expected_result: The role on the top should have its text present so you can identify what it is
data.short_description: On 200 zoom, when attempting to add a role to a user by clicking on their profile then the plus sign, the role on the top of the list has no text shown and only part of the box.
data.steps_to_repro: - Set zoom to 200 - click on a user's profile - click the plus sign to add a role - move your mouse over the top of the list
